name: PUM
detailed_description:

About the Software

PUM - a program for quick access to the necessary files, folders and applications.

The program runs in the background. By holding down the shortcut keys (which the user sets up himself), the PUM program opens. In this window you can see the recent files that have been used. Also, you can get quick access to files, folders and applications that you add to PUM.

The PUM program is a flexible tool that can be customized:

- You can choose a convenient keyboard shortcut for quick navigation and for pinning the window during detailed settings.

- To add necessary files, folders and applications to PUM, it is enough just to transfer them (or their shortcuts) from the desktop to the program window.
This application will help you quickly access the necessary tools during operation.
